question: A friend has written a letter to you informing you about his or her plan to visit your country/city.Write a letter to him/ her. In your letter, write:what he or she can do in your country/cityadvise him about the place he could stay atsuggest to him/her what to pack and bring while coming to travel to your country/city
text: I am too excited to hear that you are visiting  London at the same time I feel bad that I will be travelling to France for my planned office work. I hope you will love the place as there are lots many sights and attractions that match your Interest.

I will suggest you stay at my friend's place in  central London. It would be so beneficial for you as the major stations and the attractions are near to his house. I have emailed you the list of places that you could visit out of which my favourite is Scotland you will fall in love with the scenic beauty of this city.  In addition to that, I would recommend you to visit  central London which is famous for its historical monuments and museums.

As you will be travelling during the month of December, I would recommend carrying  winter jackets and skin moisturizer. I hope you will enjoy  visiting my country. Please share the pictures of your trip.
You can email me if you are looking for any recommendations when visiting.
